page.title: 09DISTRICT NURSE
page.content: The area the nurse covers is Smithton, Culloden, Culloden Moor and Balloch. She has a car with her job.The nurse uses the Culloden Clinic for people to phone and make appointments to see her.She visits about 14 people a day. The nurse has no employees to help her with her daily work.She does a lot of house visits.The doctor at the Clinic informs her to visit a certain patient who is needing help. The duties of her work are dressings, bathings, injections etc.The people she visits are mostly babies.If there is anything that is too serious she gets them straight to hospital or they just phone their doctor and send for an ambulance.
